Coco Chanel fashion Trend Revolutionary

Chanel can not stop topic earlier in the Shanghai Pudong opened Chanel flagship store, as well as from well-designed Chanel Paris Lafayette Shanghai series, once again reveal all pairs of Coco Chanel's feelings. There will soon release the film "Chanel's Lover", everything seems to be the fashion to draw the enemy to.

Coco Chanel on the background and the story is there are many, from the Fang Jian fashion reports and the earlier film "Chanel girl," probably all know the legend of her life. 1971 Paris Lido pool in her hotel apartment died due to heart disease has been nearly 30 years, but the fashion industry still continues to bring her story, ladies are still on the 5th of her Chanel perfume and Tweed jackets stubbornly persists.

Chanel formerly known as Gabrielle Chanel, but since that time she was fond of sunbathing and a tan color, it is called Coco (chocolate beans). Chanel's career from the start with the design of her cap, when she was introduced to a wealthy businessman lover, I've met a British gentleman Arthur Capel, then Chanel Fall in love with him mad at his money and support, Chanel in Paris, a maximum of VIPs gather Deauville opened the first boutiques. Chanel talent gradually Paris high society recognized aristocratic ladies have to find her to design clothes, whose name reverberates in Paris fashion circles. From her entrepreneurial process, I saw her ambition is also an opportunist.

When there were a lot of dignitaries that Chanel shuttling between the purpose of using them to climb, in the film "Girl Chanel" can be seen inside. I definitely think that this means that she is not affecting the present, many women? Women in fashion circles, not imitation Chanel is such a positive and enterprising attitude, it is learned Gucci's Creative Director Frida Giannini workplace has considerable networking skills.

World War II, before the Chanel 2.55 fashion house of its business end, with the exception perfume business, until 1954, she regroup, re-opened Chanel boutiques, its design is still deeply loved by Ms.. However, in the next 17 years, Chanel's life becomes even more low-key, rarely attend public occasions, only to quietly with her fashion house staff to do the design, although the mentality changed, but her designs are still the creation of the trend, and this trend is will not be time to wash, like many small streams as immortalized in the fashion book.

Chanel once said: "The most simple design is truly elegant." The theory of fashion in today's fashion circles there is still a group of followers. Speaking of the most classic Cheap Chanel Bags design, of course, is her Tweed skirt suit, that four-pocket, round neck tie while self-cultivation of the Tweed jacket, costume a knee length skirts, neck wearing a pearl necklace, this image of the cross - half a century. As we all know Chanel can not insist on exposing the knee skirt, she exposed the knee skirt that is ugly. There she designed the camellias, and is still the soul of the brand Chanel.

Chanel's design known as "permanent influence", but Chanel's own dress, in fact, behind the design of the shadow of her young age, she is dressed very neutral, in those days, she wore white shirt and suit trousers to go horseback. There is also a very deep image is she wearing a black round neck long-sleeved shirt, neck a string of pearl necklace, a white wide-leg pants, his head a black and white hat, this temperament is difficult to describe with pen and ink, elegant and chic women and men mixed.

In the movie "The Devil Wears Prada" There's a scene where the female lead in the night shape of the New York streets, not with Chanel's style is very similar to do? The Sarah Jessica Parker in "Sex and the City" where there have been a similar dress, it is clear are the Chanel dress mode.

In today's fashion circles, I absolutely believe it will cost money in the brand-name clothes for women, each own at least one Chanel's Tweed jacket, just as every woman have a white shirt. Also reminds me of a late aristocratic social circles in Hong Kong, and she named Wing Kam Po (Hong Kong tycoon Joseph Lau is the ex-wife), she was still alive when Chanel super fans, with all of the more than Chanel dress. Also reminds me of former U.S. President John F. Kennedy's wife Jacqueline Kennedy, John F. Kennedy was assassinated the day of the year, in its side of the Jacqueline was wearing a Chanel pink Tweed suit.

If you think Chanel's influence only in women, on the wrong, after today, Karl Lagerfeld to create, under, Chanel is no longer a women's Froebel, Chanel Handbags limited production of men's design, a men's tailor Chanel Tweed jacket, the same fascination with the male. Dior Homme former Creative Director Hedi Slimane, Hong Kong's well-known makeup artist Zing, is this not a fan of Chanel Bags Tweed jacket. Caused by female fashion to the male fashion trends and the influence of a designer is more important than any other in the final analysis, there is no Chanel Handbags , not the fashion trends.

Chanel ,Hand spirit, decay? Renaissance?

Chanel ,Hand spirit, decay? Renaissance?

Ten years later, if we have the opportunity to go back just past 2009, or can be summed up this year fashion two major significance. The first is July 7, 2009, and always adhere to a pure hand-crafted designer Christian Lacroix haute couture show for a curtain call. The previous month, its brand has been declared bankrupt. Second, to December 3, 2009, as a Chanel hand-Workshop series, "Paris - Shanghai" director Karl Lagerfeld in the design of landing under the leadership of Shanghai.
Similarly, main, "hand-spirit," between life in the death, retirement forward to more reading.

Karl Lagerfeld

"This is not only for the Chinese market, it is for the whole world. Fashion is constantly creating new bright spot, to make changes. Like me, I have never used a lot of red, red is very new to me, then why not From Shanghai to start? not from the 'Paris-Shanghai' series to start? As for the Shanghai Chanel boutiques decorated, in fact, Sharon is in the form of antique furniture from the 18th-century French artist Jean-Michel Othoniel to a specially-designed giant golden pearls produced in Murano set Cable Gold Lasso, inspired by the No. 31 rue Cambon in Paris, Ms. Chanel home - where there are many golden antique furniture and works of art! "

Chanel's Shanghai dream

Not to go back to the time years ago that "Great Power" in China, only to wait and see the birthplace of modern fashion - Paris, France, toCoco Chanel's fashion , represented by a century masters Fun fashion trend. In this fashion, the Chinese undoubtedly been marginalized for too long, so that in December 2009 the design director of Chanel's Karl Lagerfeld's trip to Shanghai to become China's fashion industry one can not ignore the event.

The Karl's trip to Shanghai, bringing the Chanel's "Paris - Shanghai" Advanced Hand Square conference. Heard December 3 evening, Huangpu River Huangpu Park, a tailor-made barge on the 85-meter-long strip of T stage, more than 30 world famous models interpretation of the 71 sets of shape. T Taiwan side of the glass reflected upside the glass of the Huangpu river rolling, and the night under the skyscrapers of Pudong group, so it seems, is like walking in the river model, like the surface.

"Surreal!" Or the only word to describe this night, this show. As the reporters said: "the world outside of China, the Shanghai also means that a concept, a dream, not just a really big city has a population of 20 million." Play the design of Karl, in the Up to 71 sets of the shape of Chanel 2010 Early Autumn series ( "Paris - Shanghai" Advanced Hand Square series), the show is more imaginary than real, more present than the status quo is history.

"Exotic imagination" show games throughout the day. You ever thought possible fit with the sleeve pagoda-shaped contour, slim waist without losing a sense of sculpture, cascading folds and columns. Black, red, khaki and midnight blue, and high-necked shirt, embroidered jackets, knit shirts and convex patterns from the traditional Chinese cheongsam inspired design makes waist memorable. The accessories area, long earrings, and hats shaped hat, highlighting the beauty of facial lines; pearl buttons Zhuiman necklaces, brooches and bracelets, exceptionally beautiful; knees long legs in boots and other sections of the footwear, fine sculpture shoes are very Keren; and handbag designs, embroidery or sequins decoration, suede or satin material, combined with the rich color combinations, creating a charming and sexy in the Western imagination Oriental city.

The spirit of Chanel handbags

From Chanel's Shanghai back to reality, declining in China, advanced customization appears to be revived. Perhaps that is a Chanel look into China at this time the reason why. With regard to the controversy over high-level customization, as early as when the financial crisis is not heard before. The financial crisis, several traditional fashion brand, has bankruptcy, no doubt for advanced custom opponents a lot of arguments increased. The Chinese have a word - "inappropriate," used here, appropriately. Dao Shi Chanel Square series of hand some of the flavor of dark horse.

This point, there is a large part be attributed to the design director of Chanel's Karl Lagerfeld. There SuzyMenkes fashion sector, said: "As long as there is Karl at the helm Chanel one day, high fashion will not die."

This is a well known designer, deep to expose the design of the Road COCO Chanel , design clothes at the same time, but also Atsushi guarding Chanel brand with the times and business promotion. In his view: "Coco Chanel in a bold approach in designing women's, and her concept is a modern example of, I have to do is to capture the modern spirit that she is not going to retro nostalgia, but rather reflect our times, will be Chanel spirit, causes and feelings turned to today's design, with today's closely integrated pulse of the times and fashion. "

But even such a Chanel, such as Karl Lagerfeld, has committed to retain the foundation of France's Haute - Hand Square.

Since 1985, Chanel Bags in the luxury goods industry, the trend among the sword easy road, has acquired France's top arts and crafts workshops, the buttons Square Desrues, feathers Square Lemarié, embroidery Square, Lesage, footwear Square Massaro, hat Square, Michel , gold and silver Square Goossens and floriation Square Guillet. Among these are the "Save the unique traditional craft in France, and will leave them in Paris," the enthusiasm of the ideal, but also inadvertently laid the uniform of the future will be high-level set a solid foundation for mass production. At present these are mostly hand-Square undertake high-level set of uniforms and Chanel Handbags "Advanced Hand Corner" series, "Advanced Hand Corner" series is a tribute and exquisite craft show, easily hundreds of hours of manual time-consuming to make than the high-level market garments also a small minority, even haughty.

Since 2002, Chanel cities in different countries each year as the theme, the introduction of higher hand-Square series. To those in the intergenerational transmission of skills, the kind of jewelry need a time-consuming hundreds of hours or even thousands of hours of hand-crafted, every detail of all use the world's most precious materials and unique in the world sewing mode of production process to pay tribute.

In the fashion industry you can not be too loyal to his ideals, we must know how to size up the situation to change, because the ideal itself is some change over time thing. I often vary with the times and adjust the evolution of taste and fashion their own ideas, otherwise they will become old, you may think I am an opportunist. Today, everybody praise good, tomorrow, maybe not, this is fashion! You can not say that this is my idea of ah, there is no other. Fashion idea is to follow the times have changed, like the elegant concept of beauty today, it has been underestimated. - Karl Lagerfeld

Desrues Button Square in 1985 include Chanel

Workshop in France Ouyi Sai area, 160 skillful employees who operate the machines to casting, carving, dyeing, carving, polishing on the enamel or Chanel buttons. 8 times a year showing at least 100 kinds of designs.

Lemarié feathers into the Chanel Square in 1996

Before the year in 1880, all hats are decorated with feathers, André Lemarié's grandmother Palmyre Coyette we set up this feather decoration studio, has since became well-known in the fashion industry for decades, to become master of France's top feathers. Today, Chanel selected by the South African vulture, swan, peacock and ostrich feathers and other valuable, after dyeing, trimming, peeling and crushing after they have become a decorative element of fashion to promote the fashion trends evolving.

Michel hat into the Chanel Square in 1997

Auguste Michel in 1936 founded House of Michel, was designated as a number of top fashion brand women's clothing brands designed hat. Regardless of the fashion design idea on how to master their fanciful, Michel can be 11 to meet their needs.

Lesage embroidery Square in 2002 includeChanel
Lesage's story began in 1858. Chanel, after joining in 2002, is still the first choice for fashion predators embroidery supplier. Karl Lagerfeld new quarterly series, sketch design and composition will be added to the Lesage embroidery.
Francois Lesage and his team of designers and embroidery division will be uniform for each series of high-level production of about 100 new samples, they have been manufactured since 1858 has 40000 samples, also has more than 60 tons of supplies inventory.

Massaro footwear Square in 2002 into the Chanel handbags

Over the past 50 years, whether it is the stage or big screen star, feet shoes again beautiful, and are inferior to the Department out of the door Raymond Massaro shoemaker names over the past years, the Workshop has always been determined to protect the shoe program. Each model comes with beech wood production of shoe last, and then trimmed leather shoe type.

Goossens Jewelry Square in 2005 into the Chanel

Goossens Jewelry Square will be good as gold, silver, bronze metal casting as a unique jewelry and accessories. Because the co-operation with Chanel, the young jewelry craftsmen there is no worry to use gold, silver, expensive precious stones, quartz, wood, glass, mosaic and other kinds of materials, modulation works out of unexpected innovations.

Guillet floriation Square in 2006 includeChanel

Founded in 1896, has been a family-run of "Flower accessories" Arts & crafts, the early production for theaters and cinemas, flower decoration

Xu Qing of Paris will Chanel with Karl to create "new

LOS ANGELES recent works in Vienna Ganpai Gao Xixi "beautiful flowers in the open" and Xu Qing, was invited by Chanel to participate in "Winter 2010 Paris Fashion Week." It is reported that this Fashion Week will gather the world's leading fashion brands and international stars, but Xu Qing as the only Asian artists invited to attend, and would "fashion Great" Karl Lagerfeld Gongshang Chanel fashion show. In addition, the new owner Huayi Brothers will also be heavily to build its "ultimate new clothes", this sword from Chanel's new clothes will be time-consuming production of the past six months, Xu Qing, will also visit the Chanel in France headquarters and home in the core body.
Xu Qing Cheng Chanel fashion show in Asia the only artist invited to For a long time, Paris, known as "the world's fashion center of the center." Began in 1910, also in Paris Fashion Week New York Fashion Week, Milan Fashion Week and London Fashion Week, together known as the world's four major Fashion Week. Many of the world will work together to offer first-line fashion brands fashion show nearly a hundred games to lead the latest fashion. During the Paris Fashion Week is also a star-studded Stars shine, a number of top international designers, as well as well-known artists will attend.

The Fashion Week will be from North America, Europe, numerous international stars, while the invited artists in Asia only Xu Qing, it is understood This time not only on the Great Karl fashion to have the "China's cover," said Xu Qing known as goodwill, but also Because a perfect interpretation of the Chanel Xu Qing has been advocating a "low-key luxury, both inside and outside the United States and the pursuit of elegance."

Award ceremony with the Chanel and Karl to build the ultimate clothes for Xu Qing

It is learned that Xu Qing This time was invited to Fashion Week, will be the highest courtesy Chanel. In addition to Council and the Carl Gong Shang Chanel fashion show, will also be invited to visit the Chanel headquarters in Paris, and the core body home. Furthermore, Chanel have spent the most time-consuming professional team of nearly six months as Xu Qing create "the ultimate New Clothes", for new clothes Xu Qing also went to France in the next six months at least three times in the fitting.

For the first time coming out the top into a fashion show or to enter the international touchstone for

Starred in hit TV drama over the Ministry of Xu Qing from the debut will be well received by the general public has been loved by his sweet smile and elegant qualities also made her known as "China's cover", while in the movie "the great cause of nation-building" in the success of playing the "mother of the country," Soong Ching Ling Xu Qing corner is so that the focus of the limelight.

Throughout Chanel handbags Successive spokesmen, from Marilyn Monroe to Nicole Kidman then Diane Kruger (Diane Kruger), Vanessa Paradise (Paradis), Keira Knightly (Keira Knightley), and both are elegant and rich topic, figure, and therefore known as a low-key distinguished Xu Qing, was also invited into the reasonable. Insiders commented that Xu Qing body's unique flavor and Chanel nobility adhered to coincide with the simplicity of the noble style, and Xu Qing has adopted a "the role of high-profile, I am low-key" approach is more fitting of theChanel a20995 advocates of "low-key luxury," perhaps Chanel's event is just a start Xu Qing entailed

Interpretation Rouge Coco Chanel lipstick

Ms. Chanel lipstick extreme infatuation, and she created in 1954 on a lipstick on the N ° 5 perfume bottle resembles a rectangular enclosure. The intimate design of the classic lipstick, can obviously about to accompany a woman's side. It's called: ROUGE COCO.
Ms. Chanel lipstick extreme infatuation, and she created in 1954 on a lipstick on the N ° 5 perfume bottle resembles a rectangular enclosure. The intimate design of the classic lipstick, can obviously about to accompany a woman's side. Chanel handbags lady even intimate at 2.55 each Link Check a bag set aside a special place inside lipstick pocket. This historic lipstick, as time progresses, continue to bring new technology into one, introducing new ideas. Ms. Chanel in the emphasis on a high standard at the same time, this balm constantly improve themselves, to keep pace with the times. As N ° 5 perfume bottle, its shape after a few minor changes, but almost-they're starting to make this saga sustainable future.

The women's indispensable lipstick by Chanel creative director of the Global Make-Up • Peter Phillips (Peter Philips) redesign of the building, showing an unprecedented new outlook of the embodiment of today's - ROUGE COCO Chanel lipstick.
ROUGE COCO I am fascinated by texture, I have never seen so comfortable, so easy to apply the lipstick. This is a smear of lipstick every day, gently wiped away immediately added touch of color for lips and melt in the Chunjian of moisturizing, which is why apart from the color texture of things I have also placed particular emphasis on reason. Of course, we also retained a number of classic colors, such as the 1954 debut of the "golden sari" (Sari Doré), 1996 launch of the "Black Charm Red" (Rouge Noir). At the same time, I am also pink, red and brown line to search for a variety of subtle changes.

I hope that the new generation like the lip gloss, lipstick refusal of women, through ROUGE COCO again return to this classic women's lipstick make-up steps. Woman, embellished with lipstick lips, this is a beautiful picture of how much ah! It will cheap chanel a20995 change your attitude. Like smearing the nail polish, your posture will become completely different, more restrained, more dignified. And the lipstick, it has been working with elegance as partners. "

Chanel 2.55, selling is not the package, is a legend

In each season under the concept of nature's intricate design, Chanel (CHANEL) Link Check Classic will be transformed into a different material, different colors, different sizes of the deformed section. Whether it is brown in color, decorated with red and mixed edge-color Link Check package; or brand bags full of classic pearl embellishment Check ling edge of the packets; even played in Liu nails, covered with tassels of Dynamic Link Check package and then filled with the giant down Link Check packages are, without exception, to maintain the brand has always been elegant. This is enough to make a woman crazy, people never to buy not finish, but also to buy enough.

This group of photographs shows the Chanel Spring-Summer 2010 , a new trend.

Hangzhou Tower Chanel boutiques, from the moment the door, you will find yourself into a grand CHANEL galleries, counter-ri, exhibition shelves, for display in the Chanel boutique quiet, has a share of the brand's unique grace and elegance . In addition to jewelry, eyewear, watches and limited edition 200 ml perfume, the Hangzhou Tower Chanel boutique shop to see the most is its home Chanel2.55 handbag had. With a gold or silver chain, the delicate little sheepskin or calfskin Chanel2.55 handbag Rouliang almost filled both sides of the wall of the display rack. Of course, it's price is also expensive, staggering price of more than 20,000 yuan.

While the handbags are given multiple times in the commodity meaning, it is no longer merely a thing of the supplies used to install, but that you taste, money, taste, fashion acuity, personal habits of the mirror, but if used these criteria for judging the In Chanel handbags on this does not seem logical, because this was born 55 years ago, the handbag is still a long affiliation with everlasting face, it is difficult and trend detached, but it is this magic bag firmly occupy the Hangzhou Tower Chanel boutique space, Ben Zhao Chanel2.55 handbags from guests have flocked to the Midas touch in this little bag can be fascinated to Hangzhou, a woman has become fashionable women's dream of a single product.
Hermes of the Kelly bag, Dior's Lady Dior bag, every bag is a classic set of functional and aesthetic requirements in a work of art, there is a sufficient vancomycin Liufang the name of the Chanel 2.55's name come from? The answer is very simple, named 2.55, just because this bag was born on February 1955, is the brand Chanel, founder of Miss with a time-based nature of the make.
Post-war Europe in 1955 was a period of relative lack of materials, waste materials re-use became the people's fashion statement, it was the use of a large number of parachute into a wedding dress cut, but in order to save leather, Chanel lady's approach is to simply put Chanel suit hem at the gold chain ripped years, and leather wrapped together, made a mashup of the strap section.

And this was the area's first luxury design with shoulder strap bag, shoulder strap has been wrapped in that era, and the working class, workers, rather than the elegant aristocratic Miss linked to the introduction of the luxury handbag strap design elements, designers have to admire the courage of the year. This is exactly the Chanel lady said, "to liberate the female body, natural but also the liberation of their hands," the best proof. In the 1950s, she felt more and more women take on social roles, they have a job, a family, to fly, it needs its own drive. Must at all times in the past that pinch in your hand Kunbao become cumbersome and outdated; she skillfully "transplant" of a thin strap in the package, the design of a ramp into a backpack. As a result, first used in military backpack strap, and finally entered the field of fashion
Chanel 2.55 bag usually soft and delicate sheepskin and calf, while the calf will often be processed into a granular, and has a pleasant sounding name - litchi skin, in addition, the brand will also introduce other materials limited edition bag Last year, the new push Navy precious crocodile skin handbags is one of the chanel classic 2.55 .

Square Button:chanel 2.55 bag is a rectangular lock, this button has a name called Mademoiselle, French Lane is a miss meant to say is that Miss Chanel never married.

Pairs of chains: coco was born in the orphanage, orphanage administrators to children from the waist chain with the same cross-lock (sounds terrible), coco strap in the design of part of the package just thought of something like the chain.

Purple sandwich: It was the color of the clothes orphanage orphans. At that time, the administrator of the orphanage at the monastery - that is, wet nurse to wear them are black and white clothes, which is the classic Chanel black and white to become one of the reasons color bar.

Lindsay Lohan (Lindsay Lohan) will no longer be "Buddh

As Paris Fashion Week, Fashion Show, one of the most anticipated, Chanel (Chanel) 2010 autumn and winter clothing show the time in France, opened March 9. The recent Milan Fashion Week and Paris Fashion Week "duck to water" and Lindsay Lohan (Lindsay Lohan) by Chanel (Chanel) designer Karl Lagerfeld (Karl Lagerfeld) the invitation to become one of the guests show field, and once again with the "Old Buddha," photo!

"Cartoons from the heart-shaped hair into rich rococo silver boots mean, this show demonstrates the future of romanticism. The entire conference in Lafayette in Nanchong Baptiste Giabiconi suits and women dressed in gold-colored model in the form of the end of the show staged wedding.

Design inspired by the 1920s, its long vertical lines and bell-shaped hats were passed out of this information, but too much of a long paragraph will appear heavy, old-fashioned, chanel so dragging garment seems to be the best alternative to maintain the lightness of the At the same time lengthen the lines, but also showing a chanel bags a20995 slightly backward models elegant styling

Lagerfeld obsession and abandonment

As the saying goes, behind every successful man there is a successful woman, over the years is often said that this sentence, it is in place is also very classic, but these words used in the fashion industry may be a bit less in place. Most representative of Karl Lagerfeld, the fashion circle has behind him the emperor of course, can not be just a woman behind him there are N number of men ... ...

We are under the care of the general male counterparts, although stress Ladies first, but it also can not be left out of our men were, Karl Lagerfeld has really a lot of men behind him, the appearance of course, did not have to say.

In this circle, whether ordinary or the design of our masters who need to constantly change, the old people go, naturally there will be new to. The Baptiste Giabiconi is Karl Lagerfeld's "new favorite."

New favorite - Baptiste Giabiconi

This is now extremely favored newcomers a Karl let the old man up for his shot in France, a large version of Vogue. But Karl is always the old man the way for the pet as a single - filmmaking practices and Hedi ... ... This happens to coincide with school who is who in the end we all know their own sense of proportion.

Still remember? Karl saw Baptiste Giabiconi old man in the first face, said one simple sentence Karl's style is quite in line with the words "He looks really like me, ah! Or better than my version to see you?" Now let's look at Baptiste Giabiconi, even Baptiste Giabiconi of theChanel Bags series are filled with Karl's shadow.

Once he - Brad Kroening

You could not utter his name, but in the more than Chanel Handbags show, you will not forget his handsome and graceful appearance. He is now the world's top male model. Year was digging brokers, can not wait to graduate, he immediately pushed his firing line. However, the real Brad Kroening grand plans, or in 2004 was Karl Lagerfeld "discovered" really become a TOP-class Model, romantic suave of Brad Kroening was once the most favorite model Karl had for Lagerfeld, Ralph Lauren, Tommy Hilfiger, FENDI , Perry Ellis, Chanel and other brands which serves to capture advertising.

Lagerfeld almost all the shows, advertising, photography where there Brad. Chanel flagship store in Tokyo and even the opening of the commemorative photo inside, and you see They appeared at the same time. Karl Lagerfeld old man hiding under the wings for several years, as long as Lagerfeld master, not far away must be able to Xian Zhao lovely Brad. I remember Karl for his old man was also filmed a set of photo albums do, but also took him to a house located in Vermont, we can see that he was more than love.

Although Brad Kroening of Karl Lagerfeld in the position that has been replaced by the words come back if there is no Karl Lagerfeld, he may never become a top male model. But no doubt, Karl Lagerfeld is an absolute fashion Fanyunfuyu hand.

Remember Karl Lagerfeld launched in Berlin, called "one man show" at a festival. Film Festival Focus on Karl's muse - the United States male model Brad Kroening, over the past five years for his film work. Although the name of a person's show, through he emotional light and shade, we could feel the two men dialogue.

Women in general than men to be careful, but do not underestimate us women, do not forget that sentence, and women hold half the sky! Moreover, she is the right-hand man Karl Lagerfeld.

Right-hand man - 69-year-old personal assistant to Anita Clothing

Karl Lagerfeld has a flexible tactile, intelligent mind, and anyone unable to shake his fashion identity of the Great, had to put his ideas on the idea of a mysterious woman from the hands with a flexible interpretation of interpretation. She is the Karl Lagerfeld of the most effective personal clothing assistant Anita. With Karl Lagerfeld's creative imagination, with Anita perfect presentation, there will be some one has a unique Chanel (cosmetics, handbags).

Anita from 16-year-old began working at the Chanel, but now nearly 53 years, why should she be able to persist in the work of the same brand so long? With Karl Lagerfeld has maintained a tacit agreement not to dwell on. It is no exaggeration to say that when Anita and Karl Lagerfeld work together, Anita is Karl's hand, Karl is Anita mind.

While the 69-year-old Anita is now semi-retired, but she was to go back twice a year to help Karl to prepare briefing. Karl Lagerfeld told her very seriously, "the work here can not do without you." She also gained an understanding that he can not be separated more than 50 years working for the environment and young groups. Karl mentioned that one year gave her a birthday present, fashion chanel handbags Karl is very careful, specially selected pair of scissors to her style, find the best craftsmen in Paris to produce this diamond brooch, Anita considerable care.
